content.html: Does anyone have specific recommendations for a 27" monitor available in the UK? ðŸ–¥ My requirements: flat, small bezels, VESA mount (I have mine on my wall). I'm also interested to know if anyone uses their monitor as a dock - power and data pass-through, etc.
content.value:

My requirements: flat, small bezels, VESA mount (I have mine on my wall).
